Text: WHAT DO WE USE TO UNPACK THIS??   I HAVE WINRAR AND WINZIP AND CANNOT UNPACK IT WHATSOEVER.
rename the extension  .r00 , .r01 etc... then use winrar to unpack and you should have a .bin  and .cue file.

I've tried this - and I'd have to say it's on a par with the 1 megabyte poker games you can download for free.  It's terribly anoying and slow to play just a hand.  One of the worst games I've played for poker.


On the positive side this might actually be the best lan poker game available, since there are basically no others.  Also if it were this or nothing I'd take this.  

Here are the reviews I could find, and they basically nuke this game:

http://www.gamespot.com/pc/puzzle/worldpokerchampionship/review.html
http://www.mygamer.com/index.php?page=gameportal&mode=reviews&id=550822
and finally some user reviews:
http://shopping.yahoo.com/p:World%20Poker%20Championship%20PC%20Game:1991475917:page=user-reviews

I just hope Moneymaker was payed a lot to have his name abused like this.
